meanings.definition: Not in a state of being satisfied or contented.
meanings.sent1: She felt unsatisfied with her meal at the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The child looked unsatisfied with the toy he received.
meanings.sent3: The unsatisfied cat kept meowing for more treats.
meanings.sent4: His unsatisfied hunger gnawed at him all day.
meanings.sent5: The unsatisfied customer demanded a refund.

meanings.definition: A unit of weight equal to one sixteenth of a pound.
meanings.sent1: She bought a pound of apples and only had a few uns left.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for half an uns of flour.
meanings.sent3: He measured out an uns of sugar for the cake.
meanings.sent4: The jeweler carefully weighed out the uns of gold.
meanings.sent5: The scale showed exactly one uns of butter.
